NIDM Concepts.label: NIDM_Concepts
NIDM Concepts.Description: Concepts used to annotate publicly available neuroimaging datasets (e.g., OpenNeuro, ABID)

BIDS Specification Terms.label: BIDS_Terms
BIDS Specification Terms.Description: Brain Imaging Data Structure Specification Terms

CONP DATS Terms.label: CONP_DATS_Terms
CONP DATS Terms.Description: The Canadian Open Neuroscience Platform combines access to dataset meta-data with computational tools for preprocessing and analysis to provide an ecosystem for reproducible neuroscience.

NeuroBridge Terms.label: NeuroBridge_Terms
NeuroBridge Terms.Description: The NeuroBridge community focuses on increasing accessibility and reuse of Neuroscience datasets.
